notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: ways that students prepare for exams
his method:
not preparing in the week ahead
staying up all night before the exam to study
her method:
not preparing in the week ahead
getting a lot of sleep the night before the exam
opinion:
woman's way is better
my way is like man's

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
